Class Character

java.lang.Object
entity.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attackable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Player, Zombie
public abstract class Character extends Object implements Attackable
Base class representing any character in the game (Player or Zombie).

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected boolean
    alive
    Status indicating if the character is alive.
    protected int
    attackPower
    Attack power of the character.
    protected double
    critChance
    Probability to deal a critical hit (0.0 - 1.0).
    protected double
    critDamage
    Damage multiplier for critical hits.
    protected int
    defense
    Defense value to reduce incoming damage.
    protected double
    dodgeChance
    Probability to dodge an attack (0.0 - 1.0).
    protected int
    hp
    Current HP of the character.
    protected boolean
    lastAttackCritical
    Status indicating if the last attack was a critical hit.
    protected int
    maxHp
    Maximum HP of the character.
    protected int
    poisonDamagePerTurn
    Damage taken per turn from poison.
    protected int
    poisonTurns
    Remaining turns for poison effect.
    protected final Random
    random
    Random generator for probability calculations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(int maxHp, int attackPower, int defense, double critChance, double critDamage, double dodgeChance)
      Initialize a new Character with specific stats.
      Parameters:
      maxHp - Maximum Health Points
      attackPower - Base Attack Power
      defense - Base Defense
      critChance - Chance to critical hit
      critDamage - Damage multiplier on critical hit
      dodgeChance - Chance to dodge attacks
